item.title: Deploying a PKI with Chef
item.description: Traditionally, rolling out an X.509-style PKI has been a lot of work. You’ve got to create the CA, generate all the necessary private keys and distribute them securely, create signed certificates and distribute those, and then do it all again when renewal time comes around.
